EmailTemplate.name: Follow Up with SavingsCalc
EmailTemplate.subject: Calculate your self-employed savings with Collective - following up on our conversation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.First_Name__c},
I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to touch base with you to ensure you don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to take home more money with a Collective membership.
To help you make an informed decision, we have a savings calculator that can quickly run the numbers for you. You can access it here: https://content.collective.com/Collective-Savings-Calculator
Ready to join? Simply follow this link to sign up: {!Opportunity.Signup_Link__c}. And if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
We're thrilled to have you as a potential member and look forward to welcoming you to our community!
Best, {!User.Name}
